greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of symmetric satins of order n.
link: B. Grünbaum and G. C. Shephard, Satins and twills: an introduction to the geometry of fabrics, Math. Mag., 53 (1980), 139-161. See Theorem 5.
maple: if (n mod 2) = 0 then even:=1; al:=t1[1][2]; else even:=0; al:=0; fi;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 16 2011
